title: Is Thomas Sowell the greatest living economist? - Quora

response.answer_text: No he is not. Not even close. Greatest living economist usually refers to economists whos work either influenced a branch of economics or has widely affected policy, to which sowell has done neither. I like Sowell personally, but this a tough standard to be measured against. The greatest living economist at the moment is probably Robert Lucas. Rational expectations is the most basic foundation of modern economics, with heavy usage in all theories and affecting all policies. Im not sure there is a current close second.

He's my personal favorite living economist, but there are quite a few living Nobel Prize winning economists whose achievements I don't even understand. I find it unlikely that we can tell who will be greatest from the present day; that's something that historians in 30 years will be able to estimate far more objectively and empirically than we can today,
